insert into RAP_META_TABLE_FIELD (TABLE_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_CODE, REQUIRED, UNIQ, KEY_FIELD, FIELD_LENGTH, FIELD_PRECISION, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) values (#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{required,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldPrecision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update RAP_META_TABLE_FIELD
TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FIELD_NAME = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CODE = #{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUIRED = #{required,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIQ = #{uniq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEY_FIELD = #{keyField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_LENGTH = #{fieldLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FIELD_PRECISION = #{fieldPrecision,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where FIELD_ID = #{fieldId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update RAP_META_TABLE_FIELD set TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FIELD_NAME = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD_CODE = #{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIRED = #{required,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIQ = #{uniq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEY_FIELD = #{keyField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD_LENGTH = #{fieldLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FIELD_PRECISION = #{fieldPrecision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where FIELD_ID = #{fieldId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from RAP_META_TABLE_FIELD
FIELD_ID = #{fieldId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
TABLE_ID = #{tableId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
FIELD_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{fieldName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and
FIELD_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{fieldCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and
REQUIRED like concat(concat('%',#{required, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and
UNIQ like concat(concat('%',#{uniq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and
KEY_FIELD like concat(concat('%',#{keyField, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and
FIELD_LENGTH = #{fieldLength, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
FIELD_PRECISION = #{fieldPrecision, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy, jdbcType=INTEGER} and

select f.FIELD_ID, f.TABLE_ID, f.FIELD_NAME, f.FIELD_CODE, f.REQUIRED, f.UNIQ, f.KEY_FIELD, f.FIELD_LENGTH, f.FIELD_PRECISION, f.CREATED_BY, f.CREATION_DATE, f.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, f.LAST_UPDATED_BY from RAP_META_TABLE_FIELD f,RAP_META_VIEW_FIELD vf,RAP_META_MODEL_OBJECT mo where vf.table_field_id = f.FIELD_ID and vf.VIEW_OBJECT_ID=mo.VIEW_OBJECT_ID and mo.model_id=#{modelId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
